00027 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00028 // Typing macros 
00029 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 #define DXUT_StopSound(s)         { if(s) s->Stop(); }
00031 #define DXUT_PlaySound(s)         { if(s) s->Play( 0, 0 ); }
00032 #define DXUT_PlaySoundLooping(s)  { if(s) s->Play( 0, DSBPLAY_LOOPING ); }

00069 // Name: class CSound
00070 // Desc: Encapsulates functionality of a DirectSound buffer.
00071 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 class CSound
00073 {
00074 protected:
00075     LPDIRECTSOUNDBUFFER* m_apDSBuffer;

00080

00082 
00083 public:
00084                         CSound( LPDIRECTSOUNDBUFFER* apDSBuffer, DWORD dwDSBufferSize, DWORD dwNumBuffers,
00085                                 CWaveFile* pWaveFile, DWORD dwCreationFlags );
00086     virtual             ~CSound();
00087 
00088     HRESULT             Get3DBufferInterface( DWORD dwIndex, LPDIRECTSOUND3DBUFFER* ppDS3DBuffer );
00089     HRESULT             FillBufferWithSound( LPDIRECTSOUNDBUFFER pDSB, BOOL bRepeatWavIfBufferLarger );
00090     LPDIRECTSOUNDBUFFER GetFreeBuffer();
00091     LPDIRECTSOUNDBUFFER GetBuffer( DWORD dwIndex );
00092 
00093     HRESULT             Play( DWORD dwPriority = 0, DWORD dwFlags = 0, LONG lVolume = 0, LONG lFrequency = -1,
00094                               LONG lPan = 0 );
00095     HRESULT             Play3D( LPDS3DBUFFER p3DBuffer, DWORD dwPriority = 0, DWORD dwFlags = 0, LONG lFrequency = 0 );
00096     HRESULT             Stop();
00097     HRESULT             Reset();
00098     BOOL                IsSoundPlaying();
00099 };

00102 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00103 // Name: class CStreamingSound
00104 // Desc: Encapsulates functionality to play a wave file with DirectSound.  
00105 //       The Create() method loads a chunk of wave file into the buffer, 
00106 //       and as sound plays more is written to the buffer by calling 
00107 //       HandleWaveStreamNotification() whenever hNotifyEvent is signaled.
00108 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 class CStreamingSound : public CSound
00110 {
00111 protected:
00112     DWORD m_dwLastPlayPos;
00113     DWORD m_dwPlayProgress;
00114     DWORD m_dwNotifySize;
00115     DWORD m_dwNextWriteOffset;
00116     BOOL m_bFillNextNotificationWithSilence;
00117 
00118 public:
00119             CStreamingSound( LPDIRECTSOUNDBUFFER pDSBuffer, DWORD dwDSBufferSize, CWaveFile* pWaveFile,
00120                              DWORD dwNotifySize );
00121             ~CStreamingSound();
00122 
00123     HRESULT HandleWaveStreamNotification( BOOL bLoopedPlay );
00124     HRESULT Reset();
00125 };
